title: How to Draw a Koi Fish

steps.headline: Start by sketching the head.
steps.description: To do so, draw a rounded triangle. Inside this shape, draw a circle.

steps.headline: Draw a long, slim oval coming off the upper right of the rounded triangle.
steps.description: Narrow the oval towards the end. This will be the body of the fish.

steps.headline: Draw a big M-like shape at the end of the oval.
Draw two semicircles on each side of the body.
steps.description: Draw another smaller one on the exterior right side of the head. These will become the fins.

steps.headline: Outline the shapes, adding details (such as whiskers) as you outline.
steps.description: Also add details on the fins.

steps.headline: Erase the sketch lines and draw scales on the body.

text: Start by sketching the head. To do so, draw a rounded triangle. Inside this shape, draw a circle. Draw a long, slim oval coming off the upper right of the rounded triangle. Narrow the oval towards the end. This will be the body of the fish. Draw a big M-like shape at the end of the oval. This will be the tail. Draw two semicircles on each side of the body. Draw another smaller one on the exterior right side of the head. These will become the fins. Outline the shapes, adding details (such as whiskers) as you outline. Also add details on the fins. Erase the sketch lines and draw scales on the body.  Color your drawing!
